title: Regarding capstone project publication
content: What will happen to the 2 credits in 8th sem  if someone does not publish it as a research paper?

comments.body:
Last year there was an internal review panel that reviewed the projects that did not get an acceptance or would not get it on time. The final grade was assigned based on the review.

Maybe reach out to your capstone coordinator and find out if they'll do the same this time.

Btw, they'll ask for a genuine reason why your work could not get published.
